turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to order a a large Starbucks venti caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get a the one on Main Street in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a venti caramel machiatto, with skim milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set. your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at main street and chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
